greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = (1/n) * lcm(n,p1,p2,...,pk) for that partition of n which maximizes this value among all partitions [p1,p2,...,pk] of n.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100
mathematica: b[n_, i_] := b[n, i] = If[n==0, {1}, If[i<1, {}, Table[Map[Function[{x}, LCM[x, If[j==0, 1, i]]], b[n-i*j, i-1]], {j, 0, n/i}]]]; a[n_] := Max[Table[LCM[n, i], {i, b[n, n]}]]/n; Table[Print["a(", n, ") = ", an = a[n]]; an, {n, 1, 50}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jul 29 2015, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 15 2013
